StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
Data science professional with 1+ year experience in analytical and predictive modelling. Attained post graduate diploma in
Data science and Analytics from University College Cork. An ambitious graduate with a strong background in predictive
analytics, programming, statistics and SQL with excellent communication and data visualization skills, capable of working in the
fast-paced and creative environment.

PositionHistory.Title: Junior Data Scientist
PositionHistory.Description:
Identifying project requirements and key parameters. Data extraction, cleaning and manipulation as per requirements.
Providing essential statistical analysis to project leads and managers.
Applying machine learning techniques for customer profiling, pattern recognition, sales forecasting and policy cancellation
predictions.
Reporting results with Tableau, excel and PowerPoint presentations.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 27% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Intern
PositionHistory.Description:
*Developed a scalable front-end application using C# whose work was to interact with the server
regularly at a given time and replacing the old sales data with updated data.
Managed internal database, provided statistical analysis of sales data using SQL and Excel.
Developed sales analysis report in Excel and presented it to the team.

JobCategory.Comments: User Experience describes 26% of this job

Degree.Comments: PG: PG Diploma (Data Science and Analytics) from University College Cork, Cork, Ireland in 2018
UG: BCA (Computers) from Yashwantrao Chavan Maharashtra Open University (YCMOU) in 2015

SpeakingEvent.Description: Reporting results with Tableau, excel and PowerPoint presentations
